name: Sakuyamon
effect: [When Digivolving] Unsuspend 1 of your Digimon, and for each Tamer you have in play, return 1 Option card with [Plug-In] in its name from your trash to your hand.[Your Turn] When you use an Option card with a cost of 2 or more, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn.
